label.phrase: iran's leaders would do well to rethink their gamble and suspend their nuclear program barring this the best they could hope for is that israel's conventional air assault will destroy their nuclear facilities to be sure this would mean thousands of iranian casualties and international humiliation but the alternative is an iran turned into a nuclear wasteland
